title: I Moved Out On Monday Morning
text: The rooms were very small. The bed was approximately 2 feet from the door.There was no bath tub in the room, only a shower. The carpet in the hallway was very dirty and stained. Do not sign the second document they give you when you check inn. The document states that if you check out several days early you must pay an extra $100.They charge $10 per nite for the internet.I checked in on a Sat and checked out on Monday morning, I went to the Marriott Courtyard, which was great!The elevator only holds about 4 people at a time.
